name: Fireflies Interactiv MV
description:
ALL RIGHTS FOR MUSIC GO TO OWL CITY

Interactive music video for Owl City's Fireflies 

Look around your room to find the fireflies visiting in your dreams! Collect as many as you can OR just enjoy the scenery ~ 

Best to play though multiple times! 

Also be aware, there is a small bug with the text. If you find the text overlapping at any point, just exit the game and re-open it :)

  • Use the mouse to look around
  • Left click to collect fireflies
  • Right click to zoom in 
  • Esc to exit game  

Credits
